page.title: 12MEDIA
page.content: Media in the locality is represented by two local newspapers. Both languages of the community are represented on these papers with one being mainly in{English}and the other in{Welsh.} The English language paper is the {'Ammanford Guardian'}a paper of long standing which covers news within the {Amman Valley. }A more reent addition to the area is the{Welsh}language paper{'Glo Man'(Small Coal).}It is a monthly publication which is paid for by 'Clwb y Cnape' an organisation formed to fund the local paper. All contributions to the paper are given free of charge thereby enabling the publication to be sold for 40 pence per month. This local paper is very popular with the older people of the community.
